name: test_nested_if
description: Test nested IF in loops bug fix

tests.name: nested_if_in_loop
commands: L 1 6: IF GT I 2: IF LT I 5: PRINT I

tests.name: triple_nested_if
commands: L 1 10: IF GT I 2: IF LT I 8: IF NZ I: PRINT I

tests.name: simple_if_still_works
commands: L 1 5: IF GT I 2: PRINT I
